title: References (Part 14)
content:
References

Analysis & Explanation

World Models and Diffusion Planning

Research Directions
  • World Models: Adaptive, online planning
  • Diffusion: Safe and latent diffusion planning
  • Tool Orchestration: Multi-tool coordination
